title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (Designated Bodies) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (designated bodies) order 2021

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: In this Order “Córas Iompair Éireann” means the board established by
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Córas Iompair Éireann” means the board established by 

section 5 of the Transport Act 1950 (No. 12 of 1950).
text_norm: 2 order cora iompair eireann mean board established section 5 transport act 1950 (no 12 1950)

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: In this Order “Iarnród Éireann – Irish Rail”, “Bus Éireann – Irish Bus”
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order “Iarnród Éireann – Irish Rail”, “Bus Éireann – Irish Bus” 
and “Bus Átha Cliath – Dublin Bus” mean the companies formed pursuant to 
section 6 of the Transport (Re-organisation of Córas Iompair Éireann) Act 1986 
(No. 31 of 1986), the names of which were assigned, respectively, by section 
7(1)(a), (b) and (c) of that Act.
text_norm: 3 order iarnrod eireann - irish rail bus eireann - irish bus bus atha cliath - dublin bus mean company formed pursuant section 6 transport (re-organisation cora iompair eireann) act 1986 (no 31 1986) name assigned respectively section 7(1)(a) (b) (c) act

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: In this Order “Dublin Port Company”, “Port of Cork Company” and
text_raw:
4. 

In this Order “Dublin Port Company”, “Port of Cork Company” and 
“Port of Waterford Company” mean the companies formed pursuant to section 
7 of the Harbours Act 1996 (No. 11 of 1996), the names of which were assigned 
by section 8 of, and the First Schedule to, that Act.
text_norm: 4 order dublin port company port cork company port waterford company mean company formed pursuant section 7 harbour act 1996 (no 11 1996) name assigned section 8 first schedule act

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: In this Order “Shannon Foynes Port Company” means the company of
text_raw:
5. 

In this Order “Shannon Foynes Port Company” means the company of 
that name formed for the purposes of the Harbours Acts 1996 and 2000 (Transfer 
of Functions of Foynes Port Company and Shannon Estuary Ports Company) 
Order 2000 (S.I. No. 283 of 2000) pursuant to section 43 (inserted by the 
Harbours (Amendment) Act 2000 (No. 21 of 2000)) of the Harbours Act 1996.
text_norm: 5 order shannon foynes port company mean company name formed purpose harbour act 1996 2000 (transfer function foynes port company shannon estuary port company) order 2000 (s.i no 283 2000) pursuant section 43 (inserted harbour (amendment) act 2000 (no 21 2000)) harbour act 1996

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: In this Order “daa, public limited company” means the company of that
text_raw:
6. 

In this Order “daa, public limited company” means the company of that 
name referred to in section 32 of the State Airports (Shannon Group) Act 2014 
(No. 27 of 2014).
text_norm: 6 order daa public limited company mean company name referred section 32 state airport (shannon group) act 2014 (no 27 2014)

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: In this Order “The Irish Aviation Authority” means the company formed
text_raw:
7. 

In this Order “The Irish Aviation Authority” means the company formed 
pursuant to section 11 of the Irish Aviation Authority Act 1993 (No. 29 of 1993), 
the name of which was assigned by section 12 of that Act. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [88] 3
text_norm: 7 order irish aviation authority mean company formed pursuant section 11 irish aviation authority act 1993 (no 29 1993) name assigned section 12 act notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th march 2021 88 3

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: In this Order “Shannon Group, public limited company” means the
text_raw:
8. 

In this Order “Shannon Group, public limited company” means the 
company formed pursuant to section 6(1) of the State Airports (Shannon Group) 
Act 2014, the name of which was assigned by section 6(2) of that Act.
text_norm: 8 order shannon group public limited company mean company formed pursuant section 6(1) state airport (shannon group) act 2014 name assigned section 6(2) act

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with the
heading: 9. Córas Iompair Éireann, Iarnród Éireann – Irish Rail, Bus Éireann – Irish
text_raw:
9. Córas Iompair Éireann, Iarnród Éireann – Irish Rail, Bus Éireann – Irish 
Bus, Bus Átha Cliath – Dublin Bus, Dublin Port Company, Port of Cork 
Company, Port of Waterford Company, Shannon Foynes Port Company, daa, 
public limited company, The Irish Aviation Authority and Shannon Group, 
public limited company shall each be a designated body for the purposes of Part 
3 of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 
23 of 2014). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 February, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [88]
